name: Road to Redemption
description:
Road to redemption is a window to a virtual world, where the barrier of the 4th dimension is broken, it is an image made by layers that create a very realistic depth effect, it gives the sensation of being in 3D even though it is only a flat image, the aim is that the viewer is immersed in the work and is trapped in it, The idea is for the spectator to think that he is inside the virtual world, to close his eyes and listen to the sound of the birds, the breeze, the movement of the leaves, to feel the sensation of tranquility, peace, harmony, to be one with the forest, to find his own way to the truth, to break the chains that bind him to reality and to find his own freedom inside this world.

°|Virtual world
°|Photographic Collage
°|Intervened photography
°|3300 x 4400 Px
